custom-sql.sql: SELECT e.employeeId as employeeId, concat(e.firstName, ' ', e.lastName) as employeeFullName, COALESCE(SUM(pr.count), 0) as soldDevicesCount, COALESCE(SUM(d.price * pr.count), 0) as soldDevicesOn FROM ESTORE_EMPLOYEE e LEFT JOIN ESTORE_PURCHASE pr on e.employeeId=pr.employeeId LEFT JOIN ESTORE_DEVICE d on pr.deviceId=d.deviceId WHERE (e.groupId = ?) AND (e.positionId = ?) GROUP BY e.employeeId, employeeFullName ORDER BY soldDevicesOn DESC

SELECT e.employeeId as employeeId, concat(e.firstName, ' ', e.lastName) as employeeFullName, COALESCE(SUM(pr.count), 0) as soldDevicesCount, COALESCE(SUM(d.price * pr.count), 0) as soldDevicesOn FROM ESTORE_EMPLOYEE e LEFT JOIN ESTORE_PURCHASE pr on e.employeeId=pr.employeeId LEFT JOIN ESTORE_DEVICE d on pr.deviceId=d.deviceId WHERE (e.groupId = ?) AND (e.positionId = ?) GROUP BY e.employeeId, employeeFullName ORDER BY soldDevicesCount DESC

SELECT e.employeeId as employeeId, concat(e.firstName, ' ', e.lastName) as employeeFullName, COALESCE(SUM(pr.count), 0) as soldDevicesCount, COALESCE(SUM(d.price * pr.count), 0) as soldDevicesOn FROM ESTORE_EMPLOYEE e LEFT JOIN ESTORE_PURCHASE pr on e.employeeId=pr.employeeId INNER JOIN ESTORE_DEVICE d on pr.deviceId=d.deviceId WHERE (e.groupId = ?) AND (d.deviceTypeId = ?) AND (pr.purchasedDate BETWEEN ? AND ?) GROUP BY e.employeeId, employeeFullName ORDER BY soldDevicesCount DESC

SELECT e.employeeId as employeeId, concat(e.firstName, ' ', e.lastName) as employeeFullName, COALESCE(SUM(pr.count), 0) as soldDevicesCount, COALESCE(SUM(d.price * pr.count), 0) as soldDevicesOn FROM ESTORE_EMPLOYEE e LEFT JOIN ESTORE_PURCHASE pr on e.employeeId=pr.employeeId INNER JOIN ESTORE_DEVICE d on pr.deviceId=d.deviceId WHERE (e.groupId = ?) AND (d.deviceTypeId = ?) AND (pr.purchasedDate BETWEEN ? AND ?) GROUP BY e.employeeId, employeeFullName ORDER BY soldDevicesCount DESC

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(d.price * pr.count), 0) FROM ESTORE_PURCHASE pr INNER JOIN ESTORE_DEVICE d on pr.deviceId=d.deviceId INNER JOIN ESTORE_PurchaseType pt on pr.purchaseTypeId=pt.purchaseTypeId WHERE LOWER(pt.name)='card'
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(d.price * d.count), 0) FROM ESTORE_DEVICE d INNER JOIN ESTORE_DeviceType dt on dt.deviceTypeId=d.deviceTypeId WHERE d.archive=true AND LOWER(dt.name) in ('smartphone', 'tv')
